item.title: The mission matters: Moving to climate tech as a data scientist
item.description: Discussing my recent career move into climate tech as a way of doing more to help mitigate dangerous climate change.

item.title: Migrating from WordPress.com to Hugo on GitHub + Cloudflare
item.description: My reasons for switching from WordPress.com to Hugo on GitHub + Cloudflare, along with a summary of the solution components and migration process.

item.title: Some highlights from 2020
item.description: Sharing remote teamwork insights, my climate & sustainability activism, Reef Life Survey publications, and progress on Automattic’s Experimentation Platform.
